text:
http://carbon3d.com/careers/ Redwood City, CA ONSITE, FULLTIME, VISA(?)

A whole bunch of open roles -- many in Software. I'm a mechanical engineer here, and this place is great! Lots of fun challenges ahead bringing truly revolutionary 3D printing tech to production manufacturing. $100M C round just closed w Google Ventures: http://carbon3d.com/in-the-news/
